summary: An interior decor overhaul of Proudspire Manor
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#b6b6b6][size=3]This mods changes the interior of Proudspire Manor.It decorates it in manor which suits if your charachter is a female.
Now it is more luxorius and has variety of clutter as rooms.
There is an alchemy corner with microscope and some alchemy clutter.Also there is bathroom,little kitchen etc.
You can check all that at pictures above.

I did not wanted to make an total overhaul,just to add some luxuries to this Solitude Home.
I also renamed the place to Astoria.[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#999999][size=3]Version 1.5 - Added armory,and decorated exterior little bit.[/size][/color][/font]
